price: ߞߏ߫ ߔߊߦߌߔߊߦߌ ߟߋ߫ ߣߌ߲߬ ߸ ߛߐ߲߬ߡߊ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߡߊߛߐ߬ߛߐ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: hādhihi jahannamu allatī yukadhibu bihā al-muj'rimūna
